column2: "The Devil Castle is completely destroyed. Maybe we can follow the traces of the magic that summoned it..."
"Huh, what's wrong?!"
"Big brother Luther, where are we going?"
"You'll just have to wait and see."
"But... I need to finish my etiquette studies back at the Royal Court..."
"You're a diligent learner. You can be done with that in a day and have nothing to worry about."
"Well, I promised Mother that I would study properly every day. If I don't keep my promise, it would be terribly rude to Mother."
"I also made a promise to her. In order to keep that promise, I've brought you with me. To this place."
"Wow! The whole place is covered in flowers!"
"This was Mother's favorite place. She told me to bring you here. I certainly couldn't ignore her final wish."

"Mother's favorite place.
So this is where she went..."
"Tears are unbefitting of royalty. Royalty mustn't show weakness before the people."
"Under... stood!"
"But, there aren't any people here. You needn't put up a brave front here."

"The only ones here are you, myself...
and Mother's spirit watching over this place."
"Mother's... spirit..."
"She's right here with you. I'm not lying about that just to make you feel better, either; it's the truth."
"Mother...! Mother...! I miss your hugs... I miss you brushing my hair... I've wanted to hear you praise me!"
"Mother... Mother...! Mother...!"
"There you go. Let it all out. You can't keep those tears in forever."
"Big brother... Big brother!"
"I don't think this is what you meant by looking after her, but... Ah well."
"Well now! I guess you don't hate me, then?"
"I... would never hate my big brother."
"But I thought you hated everyone. Or, maybe you just aren't interested in other people?"
"Why do you think that?"
"Because you're too smart for everyone else."
"Hehe. Hahaha... Hahahaha!"
"B-brother? What's wrong? Did I say something strange?!"
"I'm humbled, Harriet. I must be blind to have not noticed someone so interesting was right here all this time."
"Even if just a little, I've become quite interested in seeing how far your achievements will take you."
"Are you okay? Stay with me here!"
"Just now, I..."
"Luther's memories?"
"You saw Luther's memories? But, why would something like that..."
"Are the Darkers we just fought from that Devil Castle connected to Luther's memories?"
"It must be another phenomenon from being inside the Akashic Record."
"At any rate, I have a bad feeling about this. We have to hurry and find Harriet!"
